author: taylor
msg: We only need one maven build file as long as everyone uses 0.9 or greater

author: weaver
msg: I have removed persistence artifacts from DescriptionImpl and DisplayNameImpl
as ojb supports the idea of "anonymous" access allowing the object model
to be free of O/R tool clutter like unneeded primary keys and such.
You can find out more info about anonymous keys here:

author: weaver
msg: the javax.portlet.PortletConfig is added to the request for invocation
